parameters.name: AvgGiBPerDay
parameters.query:
union withsource = tt *
| where TimeGenerated > startofday({TimeRange:start}) and TimeGenerated < endofday({TimeRange:end})
// Only look at chargeable Tables
| where _IsBillable == True
| summarize
TotalGBytes =round(sum(_BilledSize/(1024*1024*1024)),2)
by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)//, Solution=tt
| summarize round(avg(TotalGBytes),2)

parameters.name: AuditTracker
parameters.query: print "TLP:White; WorkbookName:Spot≈ôeba prost≈ôedk≈Ø a pl√°novan√° cena za Microsoft Sentinel"

content.json:
## Spot≈ôeba prost≈ôedk≈Ø a pl√°novan√° cena za Microsoft Sentinel
---

#### Tento report zobrazuje statistiku t√Ωkaj√≠c√≠ se datov√© spot≈ôeby v r√°mci prost≈ôed√≠ Microsoft Sentinel. Spot≈ôeba je p≈ôepoƒç√≠t√°na na z√°kladƒõ cen√≠ku, kter√Ω je um√≠stƒõn na internetov√Ωch str√°nk√°ch spoleƒçnosti Microsoft. Cena slu≈æeb se m≈Ø≈æe v z√°vislosti na kurzu mƒõnit, p≈ô√≠padnƒõ m≈Ø≈æe doj√≠t ke zmƒõnƒõ v p≈ô√≠padƒõ, ≈æe byla cena stanovena se slevou a to nap≈ô√≠klad v r√°mci Enterprise Agreement smlouvy mezi spoleƒçnost√≠ z√°kazn√≠ka a spoleƒçnost√≠ Microsoft. Vypoƒçten√© kapacity jsou stanoveny na z√°kladƒõ informac√≠ posyktnut√Ωch u ka≈æd√©ho z√°znamu, kter√Ω je v r√°mci slu≈æby Log Analytics Workspace zaznamen√°n. Report poskytuje informaƒçn√≠ hodnotu pro vlastn√≠ka slu≈æby Microsoft Sentinel a Azure Monitor (Log Analytics Workspace), kter√Ω je odpovƒõdn√Ωm za spot≈ôeby v r√°mci prost≈ôed√≠ Microsoft Azure.

---
### Celkov√° spot≈ôeba za vybran√© ƒçasov√© obdob√≠ ({TimeRange})

parameters.name: Excludedlogs
parameters.label: Vylouƒçen√© logy
parameters.query: union withsource=TableName1 * | distinct TableName1 | sort by TableName1 asc

parameters.name: ExcludedLogsSelected

content.query:
union withsource=TableName1 *
{ExcludedLogsSelected}
| summarize Entries = count(), 
            Size = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true), 
            last_log = datetime_diff("second",now(), max(TimeGenerated)), 
            estimate  = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true)  
                by TableName1, _IsBillable
| extend _IsBillable = iff(_IsBillable == True, strcat("üí∞ ",_IsBillable),strcat("‚úÖ ",_IsBillable))
| project ['Tabulka'] = TableName1, 
          ['Poƒçen z√°znam≈Ø'] = Entries,
          ['Velikost tabulky'] = Size, 
          ['% z celkov√©ho objemu dat'] = (Size /(1024*1024*1024)) / {TotalGiB}  * 100,
          ['Je √∫ƒçtov√°no'] = _IsBillable, 
          ['Posledn√≠ z√°znam doruƒçen p≈ôed'] =  last_log , 
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v EUR'] = strcat(round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice},2)," EUR"),
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v CZK'] = strcat(round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice} * {ExchangeEURtoCZK},2)," CZK")
 | order by ['Velikost tabulky'] desc

content.json: ## Pozor m√°te aktivovan√Ω filtr na tabulku {SelectedTable}

parameters.name: SelectedTableFilter
parameters.query:
let choice = iff("all" in('{SelectedTable}'), "| where isnotempty(Tabulka)","| where Tabulka == '{SelectedTable}'");
print choice

parameters.name: THGraph1
parameters.query:
union withsource=TableName1 *
| summarize Entries = count(), 
            Size = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true), 
            last_log = datetime_diff("second",now(), max(TimeGenerated)), 
            estimate  = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true)  
                by Tabulka = TableName1, _IsBillable, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
{SelectedTableFilter}
| summarize ['Celkov√° velikost tabulek'] = avg(Size)

parameters.name: THGraph2
parameters.query:
union withsource=TableName1 *
{ExcludedLogsSelected}
| summarize Entries = count(), 
            Size = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true), 
            last_log = datetime_diff("second",now(), max(TimeGenerated)), 
            estimate  = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true)  
                by Tabulka = TableName1, _IsBillable, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| project Tabulka, 
          ['% z celkov√©ho objemu dat'] = (Size /(1024*1024*1024)) / {TotalGiB}  * 100,
          TimeGenerated
 {SelectedTableFilter}
 | summarize ['% z celkov√©ho objemu dat'] = avg(['% z celkov√©ho objemu dat'])

parameters.name: THGraph3
parameters.query:
union withsource=TableName1 *
{ExcludedLogsSelected}
| summarize Entries = count(), 
            Size = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true), 
            last_log = datetime_diff("second",now(), max(TimeGenerated)), 
            estimate  = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true)  
                by TableName1, _IsBillable, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| project ['Tabulka'] = TableName1,

content.query:
union withsource=TableName1 *
{ExcludedLogsSelected}
| summarize Entries = count(), 
            Size = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true), 
            last_log = datetime_diff("second",now(), max(TimeGenerated)), 
            estimate  = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true)  
                by TableName1, _IsBillable
| extend _IsBillable = iff(_IsBillable == True, strcat("üí∞ ",_IsBillable),strcat("‚úÖ ",_IsBillable))
| project ['Tabulka'] = TableName1, 
          ['Velikost tabulky'] = Size, 
          ['% z celkov√©ho objemu dat'] = (Size /(1024*1024*1024)) / {TotalGiB}  * 100,
          ['Je √∫ƒçtov√°no'] = _IsBillable, 
          ['Posledn√≠ z√°znam doruƒçen p≈ôed'] =  last_log , 
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v EUR'] = strcat(round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice},2)," EUR"),
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v CZK'] = strcat(round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice} * {ExchangeEURtoCZK},2)," CZK")
 {SelectedTableFilter}
 | summarize ['Celkov√° velikost tabulek'] = sum(['Velikost tabulky'])
 | extend Desc = 'Celkov√° velikost tabulek'

union withsource=TableName1 *
{ExcludedLogsSelected}
| summarize Entries = count(), 
            Size = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true), 
            last_log = datetime_diff("second",now(), max(TimeGenerated)), 
            estimate  = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true)  
                by TableName1, _IsBillable
| extend _IsBillable = iff(_IsBillable == True, strcat("üí∞ ",_IsBillable),strcat("‚úÖ ",_IsBillable))
| project ['Tabulka'] = TableName1, 
          ['Velikost tabulky'] = Size, 
          ['% z celkov√©ho objemu dat'] = (Size /(1024*1024*1024)) / {TotalGiB}  * 100,
          ['Je √∫ƒçtov√°no'] = _IsBillable, 
          ['Posledn√≠ z√°znam doruƒçen p≈ôed'] =  last_log , 
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v EUR'] = round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice},2),
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v CZK'] = round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice} * {ExchangeEURtoCZK},2)
          {SelectedTableFilter}
 | summarize ['Celkov√° oƒçek√°van√° cena v EUR'] = sum(['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v EUR'])
 | extend Desc = 'Oƒçek√°van√° cena EUR'

union withsource=TableName1 *
{ExcludedLogsSelected}
| summarize Entries = count(), 
            Size = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true), 
            last_log = datetime_diff("second",now(), max(TimeGenerated)), 
            estimate  = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true)  
                by TableName1, _IsBillable
| extend _IsBillable = iff(_IsBillable == True, strcat("üí∞ ",_IsBillable),strcat("‚úÖ ",_IsBillable))
| project ['Tabulka'] = TableName1, 
          ['Velikost tabulky'] = Size, 
          ['% z celkov√©ho objemu dat'] = (Size /(1024*1024*1024)) / {TotalGiB}  * 100,
          ['Je √∫ƒçtov√°no'] = _IsBillable, 
          ['Posledn√≠ z√°znam doruƒçen p≈ôed'] =  last_log , 
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v EUR'] = round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice},2),
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v CZK'] = round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice} * {ExchangeEURtoCZK},2)
          {SelectedTableFilter}
 | summarize ['Celkov√° oƒçek√°van√° cena v CZK'] = sum(['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v CZK'])
 | extend Desc = 'Oƒçek√°van√° cena CZK'

union withsource=TableName1 *
| summarize Entries = count(),
            Size = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true),
            last_log = datetime_diff("second",now(), max(TimeGenerated)),
            estimate  = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true)
                by TableName1, _IsBillable, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| extend _IsBillable = iff(_IsBillable == True, strcat("üí∞ ",_IsBillable),strcat("‚úÖ ",_IsBillable))
| project ['Tabulka'] = TableName1,
          ['Velikost tabulky v bytes'] = Size,
          ['% z celkov√©ho objemu dat'] = (Size /(1024*1024*1024)) / {TotalGiB}  * 100,
          ['Je √∫ƒçtov√°no'] = _IsBillable,
          ['Posledn√≠ z√°znam doruƒçen p≈ôed xy min.'] =  last_log,
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v EUR'] = round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice},2),
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v CZK'] = round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice} * {ExchangeEURtoCZK},2),
          TimeGenerated
 | order by ['Velikost tabulky v bytes'] desc
  {SelectedTableFilter}
  | project ['Tabulka'], ['Velikost tabulky v bytes'],TimeGenerated
content.title: Velikost logu v ƒçase

content.query:

            Size = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true),

                by TableName1, _IsBillable, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| extend _IsBillable = iff(_IsBillable == True, strcat("üí∞ ",_IsBillable),strcat("‚úÖ ",_IsBillable))
| project ['Tabulka'] = TableName1,
          ['Velikost tabulky v bytes'] = Size,
          ['% z celkov√©ho objemu dat'] = (Size /(1024*1024*1024)) / {TotalGiB}  * 100,
          ['Je √∫ƒçtov√°no'] = _IsBillable,
          ['Posledn√≠ z√°znam doruƒçen p≈ôed xy min.'] =  last_log,
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v EUR'] = round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice},2),
          ['Oƒçek√°van√° cena v CZK'] = round((estimate/(1024*1024*1024)) * {CompleteGBPrice} * {ExchangeEURtoCZK},2),

 | order by ['Velikost tabulky v bytes'] desc

  | project ['Tabulka'], ['% z celkov√©ho objemu dat'],TimeGenerated

            Size = sumif(_BilledSize, _IsBillable==true),

| extend _IsBillable = iff(_IsBillable == True, strcat("üí∞ ",_IsBillable),strcat("‚úÖ ",_IsBillable))
| project ['Tabulka'] = TableName1,
          ['Velikost tabulky v bytes'] = Size,
